arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg secure a commanding 5-1 victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach with an impressive second-half performance, featuring goals from Jonas Wind, Joakim Mæhle, Maximilian Arnold, and Lukas Nmecha. Joakim Mæhle scores Wolfsburg's second goal, breaking through Gladbach's defence.

arts.ttl: 20:30 kick offs: Frankfurt and Wolfsburg run riot, Leverkusen keep pressure on Bayern
arts.sum: In a hectic evening across the Bundesliga, Eintracht Frankfurt comfortably secured three points at home as their Champions League charge continues, whilst reigning champions Bayer Leverkusen keep the pressure on Bayern München and Wolfsburg ran riot against Borussia Mönchengladbach, scoring five in an emphatic victory.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg defender joins Augsburg on loan
arts.sum: FC Augsburg have loaned Cedric Zesiger from VfL Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg to continue talks to complete double transfer this winter
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Wolfsburg are to continue talks with Club Brugge and Freiburg as they look to complete two deals in this window. The Autostadt side have already agreed personal…

arts.ttl: VfL Wolfsburg vs Borussia Monchengladbach preview: Die Wolfe keen to snap dismal recent record against The Foals
arts.sum: With an identical record of 7 wins, 3 draws and 6 losses and 24 points on the board after 16 matchdays, only goal difference separates VfL Wolfsburg and Borussia Monchengladbach. Tuesday’s game presents an opportunity for the hosts to end their poor run of results against Die Fohlen-elf.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Bundesliga clash between Wolfsburg and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
